select m.*, g.*, t.* from sportsmatch m, sportsmatchteam tm, ground g, groundreserve gr, team t where m.mchno=tm.mchno and tm.teamno=t.teamno and m.mchno=gr.mchno and g.grdno=gr.grdno and m.mchtype=#{mchType} and m.mchplay like '%' || #{mchPlay}
and m.mchname like '%' || #{mchName} || '%'

select m.*, g.*, su.* from sportsmatch m, usersports su, sportsmatchindiv im, ground g, groundreserve gr where m.mchno=gr.mchno and g.grdno=gr.grdno and im.mchno=m.mchno and im.sportsno=su.sportsno and m.mchtype=#{mchType} and m.mchplay like '%' || #{mchPlay} and g.grdarea like '%' || #{grdArea} || '%' and m.mchname like '%' || #{mchName} || '%'

select m.*, g.*, t.* from sportsmatch m, sportsmatchteam tm, ground g, groundreserve gr, team t where m.mchno=tm.mchno and tm.teamno=t.teamno and m.mchno=gr.mchno and g.grdno=gr.grdno and m.mchNo = #{mchNo}
